title: Could nuclear desalination plants beat water scarcity?
description: Engineers are developing mobile, floating nuclear desalination plants to help solve water shortages.

title: New rules proposed for buy now pay later
description: The loans are used by millions but ministers want checks on affordability and clearer advertising.

title: Can crumbling cookies sweeten UK data-protection plans?
description: Government proposals to move away from EU data-protection laws post-Brexit have had a mixed reaction.
